sections.description: Captures Elementor form submissions and sends them to a custom endpoint
sections.installation: Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress. Setup the webhook URL, site id, site secret, and api in the plugin settings.
sections.changelog:
Changelog

  1. Version 1.0.9:
    • Added view details button
    • Updated styling for better UX
  2. Version 1.0.8:
    • Bumped update URL
  3. Version 1.0.7:
    • Fixed minor bugs
  4. Version 1.0.6:

  5. Version 1.0.5:

  6. Version 1.0.4:

  7. Version 1.0.3:
